mapper.insert: INSERT INTO poi_item_channel_stock ( brand_id, poi_id, stock_id, stock_status, stock_type, channel_code, channel_quota, channel_sold, channel_weight, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{brandId}, #{poiId}, #{stockId}, #{stockStatus}, #{stockType}, #{channelCode}, #{channelQuota}, #{channelSold}, #{channelWeight}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE poi_item_channel_stock SET stock_status = #{stockStatus}, stock_type = #{stockType}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE poi_item_channel_stock SET channel_quota = #{channelQuota}, channel_weight = #{channelWeight}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE poi_item_channel_stock SET channel_sold = 0, utilization_rate = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE stock_id = #{stockId}

UPDATE poi_item_channel_stock SET channel_quota = channel_quota - #{reclaimAmount}, contributed_to_pool = contributed_to_pool + #{reclaimAmount}, utilization_rate = ROUND(channel_sold / NULLIF(channel_quota - #{reclaimAmount}, 0) * 100, 1), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND (channel_quota - channel_sold) >= #{reclaimAmount}
UPDATE poi_item_channel_stock SET borrowed_from_pool = 0, contributed_to_pool = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE stock_id = #{stockId}
